description: Allows the user to change their size at will, shrinking down to as small as 5 millimeters or returning to their original giant size. The user retains their full strength regardless of size.

users.circumstances: Lily ate the fruit prior to the events of the Z's Ambition Arc

abilityReveals.description: The user can shrink to microscopic size, enter another person's body, and then enlarge inside them to make them giant-sized while maintaining their original abilities.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Lily enters Luffy's body and enlarges, turning him into a giant to help defeat Shuzo.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Permanent size change - default size becomes smaller than original
weaknesses.description: The fruit permanently changes the user's default size to about the height of two human hands. If the fruit's powers are negated (such as by falling in the sea), the user reverts to this new default size rather than their original.
If the user becomes overly excited, some body parts may become disproportionate, such as the head becoming bigger than the body.

strengths.strength: Maintains full strength at any size
strengths.description: Despite being a giant reduced to tiny size, Lily retains her giant strength, making her incredibly powerful for her small form.
Can change to any size between 5mm and full giant size, allowing for stealth, combat, and tactical applications.

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the consumer to transform into an alpaca. This fruit was consumed by a bazooka, giving it life and the ability to transform between weapon, alpaca, and hybrid forms.

users.circumstances: A bazooka weapon was fed the Devil Fruit through unknown means, similar to Funkfreed and Lassoo

abilityReveals.description: Alpacacino can transform into a hybrid form that maintains bazooka functionality while having alpaca features, allowing it to move and fire independently.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used during the battle against Luffy in Episode 578.

abilityReveals.description: Despite being a weapon, Alpacacino can imbue its cannonballs with Armament Haki, making them capable of damaging Devil Fruit users like Luffy.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Alpacacino fires Haki-imbued cannonballs that successfully injure Luffy during the battle with Shuzo.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Combination of weapon functionality and mobility
strengths.description: As a weapon that ate a Zoan fruit, Alpacacino combines the firepower of a bazooka with the mobility and autonomy of a living creature.
Can use Armament Haki to enhance attacks, making it dangerous even to Logia and other Devil Fruit users.
